title: Whos that?

embed.description: Discover & Share this League of Legends GIF with everyone you know. GIPHY is how you search, share, discover, and create GIFs.

body: Found this, seems to have been leaked. Thats probably him guys. Yorick the Smurf confirmed?

replies.body:
Anyone notice Thresh's lantern in the background from where the ghouls are coming? Do ghouls rise from dead bodies?
Also there are 4 ghouls in this GIF, so he can summon at least 4 ghouls and, based on predicitons, can cause them to jump to the target location or unit.

Details I Have Noticed:
1. Thresh lantern in the background (likely also Thresh's dead body)
2. 4 ghouls and Yorick can command them to jump
3. Yorick got a shadow cape
4. Is it raining? Is is night time?
Yorick is not a fan of Thresh

Is he a fan of Morde at least?
You know, they used to have weekly Jam out sessions...

Morde appreciates good Bass fretwork
Morde is probably one of Yoricks least liked champions. Only person he might like less is the Ruined King
You brought this upon yourself when you started to answer his likes and dislikes. What are his thoughts on kindred?
Him and Kindred go way back man. I have probably said to much already :)

Don't you dare bail on us now!
We got tons of questions!

Like, does Yorick like Pizza and what's his favorite topping?
Or does he have a favorite Ghoul and does he name them?!
Lol, I'm still here. Should keep some Q & A for the official Q & A through. Surprised no one has asked about his cape made of Black Mist yet....
Could he be a member of the order that used to exist on the Blessed Isles!?
Shhhhh

Don't tell me he used Morde's skull to recite hamlet.

{{champion:83}} "Alas, Poor Morde.  I knew him well Horacio..."

http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/d4/d4dec5d91cee3ba02593faf0b58edef41aa568676c3d28825d2aae1ee3416fa5.jpg

_already used that one, but it's just too good._

HOLD ONNNNN!!!!
IS THAT THE SAME BLACK MIST OF THE HARROWING?
IF SO THEN HE MAYBE "CREATED" THE SHADOW ISLES SOMEHOW :O
yeah i know, stupid theory, sorry, hype adrenaline

Edit: if pentakill yorick does not summon headbanging ghouls, i will be terribly disappointed

Edit of the edit: actually it copied my previous reply by accident -.-
YES THAT VERY SAME BLACK MIST!
His necklace, does it have any importance to his character or his story ?
It is EXTREMELY important to his character and story.

Don't know if you can say this, but...

...patch 6.20 potential release?
More like 6.18-16.19

So when are black mist capes coming to the merch shop?
I NEEDS IT
will the pentakill splash get an update?
It will largely be the same splash except Yorick will be updated in it.

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=gocaVYEi,comment-id=00070000000100020000000000010000000d0001,timestamp=2016-08-22T21:06:57.379+0000)
>
> It will largely be the same splash except Yorick will be updated in it.

What about putting the shoulders of pentakill mord on fire when he R ?(like on the splashart)
Yup, and from how Yorick looks, I'm guessing he'll look a bit like Eddie Riggs from Brutal Legend.
Will Draggles be voicing Yorick for his update? I don't know if he's the original voice actor or not, but he NAILED it in This is War 3 volume 2.

Well I mean, he's a gravedigger by trade, so it's probably a given.

But damn, now I'm wondering if Yorick's actually met and interacted with Kindred, not only multiple times, but also in a more personal way, talking like estranged old friends rather than Kindred sort of talking at Yorick and him listening.

Please, don't give me ideas.
I need to get sleep and not spend the night sketching Yorick and Kindred...

DO IT. GIVE IN TO YOUR ARTISTIC DESIRES. FOR THE METAL AND ALL THAT.

Or sleep, that's good to. I'll need to go to bed soon anyway; work starts at half six for me tomorrow!
Hm. I guess he's got some distinct thoughts on Kalista and Karthus then.
He has distinct thoughts on most, if not all, of the Shadow Isles characters :)

Here's something I think a lot of us are asking, but summed up really quickly with an answer we can probably all appreciate. Will he have 20 minutes of dialogue like Aurelion. I sure hope he's got TONS of quotes right?

I am willing to bet he knew Kalista before she was corrupted and can still remember his days pre-corruption. He probably likes her, but dislikes what she has become.

I think he is probably just confused by Karthus as to why he would want to become undead and then forcefully make others undead/souls.

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=gocaVYEi,comment-id=0007000000010002,timestamp=2016-08-22T19:41:29.681+0000)
>
> Morde is probably one of Yoricks least liked champions. Only person he might like less is the Ruined King

http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/786104sadmord.jpg
Because Yorick IS the ruined king!!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

You joke, but early in open ideation for Yorick we kicked around the idea that Yorick finally regained his memory and realized he was the Ruined King all along. We didn't end up going with this because we felt it was to much of a stretch from Live Yorick, but we did think about it.
tl;dr Yorick Mori forgot who Yorick Mori was. And expects everyone else to remember for him.

> [{quoted}](name=Narasimha,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=gocaVYEi,comment-id=0007000000010002000a00000005,timestamp=2016-08-23T17:29:43.360+0000)
>
> tl;dr Yorick Mori forgot who Yorick Mori was. And expects everyone else to remember for him.

_"Yorick says his own name alot or else he forgets , it has happened before!"_

please tell me you're gonna give us the ruined king as a champion...

i can almost smell it..

So here's what I'm guessing:

{{champion:60}} Elise: Doesn't appreciate her leading poor sods to a hungry spider in exchange for power.

{{champion:28}} Evelynn: Don't know, but I'm guessing this one's a little spoilery?

{{champion:120}} Hecarim: Neutral at first, but hates how he's willing to kill for fun.

{{champion:429}} Kalista: Might have crossed paths and might understand how she was deceived and stuff. A complicated, but friendly relationship?

{{champion:30}} Karthus: Pretty much hates the mere concept of preaching death as if it's a religion. "You worship death? The f***'s wrong with you?"

{{champion:236}} Lucian: Complicated relationship, but understands the lengths he's willing to take to have his vengeance. He never liked Thresh anyway.

{{champion:57}} Maokai: Might've known him before his death and the Ruination. Possible friendship?

{{champion:82}} Mordekaiser: Hates him, but hates the Ruined King a bit more. Reason being for claiming his home as his new warring empire.

{{champion:412}} Thresh: Hates him as much as Mordekaiser.

So you mean to tell me that not only doesn't Yorick like Morde but he ain't even Numero Uno of the people he dislikes?

TwT

On a serious note though.
People who like Morde might need to see a doctor.
Who'd Sympathize with the very concept of Conquest and eternal Damnation?!

I can't imagine anyone'd actually like Morde in a canon sense. I mean the dude's a literal abomination and tyrant. 

On a Yorick note though, I wonder how he fits in to the scheme of things, seeing as how his apparent dislike for some of the Shadow Isle's denizens implies he has some sort of agency within it, and that puts him in a position similar to Morde, Karthus and Kalista.

EDIT: as Inept Maverick pointed out, Thresh and Hecarim seem cool with him, though they're also twisted beyond comprehension with no trace of who they used to be left over.
Ruined King new champ :^)

I'd imagine no; Yorick's always been a man who didn't really care for wanton destruction or conquest, he just wanted to be remembered. If anything, I'd assume that he'd look at Morde as a major force behind his own suffering, but I dunno.
Think we could get a better image of the ghouls? They are to out of focus and to fast to get a good look at

Well it is a teaser :P

You will have to wait just a bit longer.
Well with this and Baker Pantheon, I'm kind of expecting Half-Life 3 later this week.

League of Legends male champion rework guide:

1) Give one of the following: pecks or beard

2) Profit
http://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/aoz8kgx8pzknypz7z38n.jpg
Damn, he's rocking a beard now.

SOMEONE PLEASE FIND THE ANIMATION ABOUT THE THREE GUYS RECIEVING GIFTS FROM DEATH.
THE LAST ONE RECEIVED A "CLOAK TO LET HIM HIDE FROM DEATH" AND WHEN HE WAS ABOUT TO DIE HE TOOK OFF THE CLOAK AND EMBRACED DEATH LIKE AN OLD FRIEND.
(Sorry for All-Caps, i am very Excited)
Yorick being the man with the cloak would explain Reav3's bits about Kindred and his Coyness about the cloak

You mean this?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bN1_h_eGitE

Mordekaiser would be the eldest brother, the Ruined King would be the second oldest, and Yorick would be the youngest.
